text: Hello, I'm coming to see you because I have a problem, it's INFURIATING, I cannot even live that way!
<textjump=0.5|1|5>Oh no that's horrible.<textpause=1> And your favorite food is<textspeed=1>...</textjump>
Chocolate, what else ! How could someone think otherwise?!
<textjump=0.5|1|5>Obviously how could anyone think of something else...</textjump>
It's Un-ac-cep-ta-ble! Yesterday I was walking with my precious chocolate and the police arrested me! You'll never know why!?
<textjump=0.5|1|5>It's not that serious,<textspeed=5> this is just chocolate Emile.</textjump>

<textjump=0.5|1|5>What?!<b><color=red> Not<textspeed=30></textjump><textjump=0.3|-1|5> THAT</textjump><textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15><textpause=0.5><b></color> serious? The chocolate? But my whole life<color=red><textspeed=30></textjump><textjump=0.3|-1|5> IS</textjump><textjump=0.5|1|5><textspeed=15><textpause=0.5><b></color> chocolate!</textjump>
<textjump=0.5|1|5>When I was a kid my plushie was a<color=#ffafc1><textspeed=10> chocolate bar</color>!</textjump>

<textjump=0.5|1|5>All my life I went to festivals where<color=red> Chococo</color>, the most cocoa-like mascot were and every time he offered me <color=red><b><camerashake=1|0.5><textspeed=20>CHOCOLATE</color>!</textjump>
Do you know what my wife was covered in on the most magical evening of my life ?
Think about the chocolate you love and focus on my watch...
Think about the candy you love and focus on my watch...
<textspeed=40><textjump=0.2|2|10>Who do you take me for? I'm not a<textrumble=0.1|-1|2><color=red><camerashake=1|0.2> KID</color></textrumble>!!
Now think about somebody you love, who relaxes you.
<textspeed=40><textjump=0.2|2|10>I<color=red><textrumble=0.1|-1|2> hate</textrumble><textjump=0.2|2|10></color> my parents<textspeed=30> I don't want to talk about it!
No, to appease me talk about the cocoa-like mascot, say his name.
<textjump=0.5|-1|5><color=#6500c5>Your eyelids are heavy, you seem to fall and let go of all your problems<textspeed=1>......
